languages.text: "О, сомневаюсь. Пока ты болтал{mf|ся|ась} между жизнью и смертью, твоя прислуга очень заволновалась. Было произнесено несколько нелепых угроз, прежде чем твои лакеи уяснили, что жизнь их хозя{mf|ина|йки} полностью в моих руках. Так что они будут послушными, не правда ли?" {n}Гемункул глумливо улыбается вашим спутникам.{/n}

"Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О, сомневаюсь. Пока ты болтал{mf|ся|ась} между жизнью и смертью, твоя прислуга очень заволновалась. Было произнесено несколько нелепых угроз, прежде чем твои лакеи уяснили, что жизнь их хозя{mf|ина|йки} полностью в моих руках. Так что они будут послушными, не правда ли?" {n}Гемункул глумливо улыбается вашим спутникам.{/n}

So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

"Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, das bezweifle ich. Während ihr zwischen Leben und Tod getaumelt seid, waren Eure Diener ausgesprochen aufgewühlt. Eure Lakaien haben einige lächerliche Drohungen ausgestoßen, ehe sie erkannten, dass das Leben {mf|ihres Meisters|ihrer Meisterin} in meinen Händen liegt. Sie werden sich also benehmen, ja?" {n}Der Haemonculus lächelt deine Gefährten spöttisch an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das bezweifle ich. Während ihr zwischen Leben und Tod getaumelt seid, waren Eure Diener ausgesprochen aufgewühlt. Eure Lakaien haben einige lächerliche Drohungen ausgestoßen, ehe sie erkannten, dass das Leben {mf|ihres Meisters|ihrer Meisterin} in meinen Händen liegt. Sie werden sich also benehmen, ja?" {n}Der Haemonculus lächelt deine Gefährten spöttisch an.{/n}

languages.text: 「さあ、それはどうかな。お前が生と死の狭間でのたうちまわっている間に、お前の従者たちは非常に動揺していたぞ。取り巻きたちは、お前の命が完全に私の手中にあることを理解する前に、ばかげた脅迫をした。ならば、躾が必要であろう？」{n}ハモンキュラスはあなたの仲間たちに皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、それはどうかな。お前が生と死の狭間でのたうちまわっている間に、お前の従者たちは非常に動揺していたぞ。取り巻きたちは、お前の命が完全に私の手中にあることを理解する前に、ばかげた脅迫をした。ならば、躾が必要であろう？」{n}ハモンキュラスはあなたの仲間たちに皮肉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: “噢，我相当怀疑。你刚刚在生死之间挣扎时，你的随行人员看起来惊慌失措。他们以令人发笑的态度威胁了我几句，但随后他们便意识到，他们主人的性命完全掌握在我的手中。也就是说，你这些手下会老老实实听话，我没说错吧？”{n}血伶人带着嘲弄的态度，对你的同伴们露出了微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，我相当怀疑。你刚刚在生死之间挣扎时，你的随行人员看起来惊慌失措。他们以令人发笑的态度威胁了我几句，但随后他们便意识到，他们主人的性命完全掌握在我的手中。也就是说，你这些手下会老老实实听话，我没说错吧？”{n}血伶人带着嘲弄的态度，对你的同伴们露出了微笑。{/n}

languages.text: «Lo dudo mucho. Mientras te debatías entre la vida y la muerte, tus sirvientes estuvieron muy agitados. Tus lacayos me lanzaron varias amenazas ridículas antes de darse cuenta de que la vida de su señor{mf||a} dependía completamente de mí. Así que van a portarse bien, ¿verdad?». {n}El Hemónculo sonríe burlón a tus compañeros.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo dudo mucho. Mientras te debatías entre la vida y la muerte, tus sirvientes estuvieron muy agitados. Tus lacayos me lanzaron varias amenazas ridículas antes de darse cuenta de que la vida de su señor{mf||a} dependía completamente de mí. Así que van a portarse bien, ¿verdad?». {n}El Hemónculo sonríe burlón a tus compañeros.{/n}

languages.text: « J'en doute fort. Pendant que vous végétiez entre la vie et la mort, vos larbins ont commis l'erreur de se rebeller. Des menaces ridicules ont été proférées, jusqu'à ce qu'ils finissent par comprendre que la vie de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} était entre mes mains. Dorénavant, ils se tiendront à carreau, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}L'hémoncule adresse un sourire moqueur à vos compagnons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'en doute fort. Pendant que vous végétiez entre la vie et la mort, vos larbins ont commis l'erreur de se rebeller. Des menaces ridicules ont été proférées, jusqu'à ce qu'ils finissent par comprendre que la vie de leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} était entre mes mains. Dorénavant, ils se tiendront à carreau, n'est-ce pas ? » {n}L'hémoncule adresse un sourire moqueur à vos compagnons.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah, şüpheliyim bundan. Sen yaşam ve ölüm arasında bocalarken, hizmetkârların bayağı tedirgin oldu. Ayaktakımın önce birkaç saçma tehdit savurdu ancak ardından efendilerinin yaşamının tamamen benim ellerimde olduğunu fark ettiler. Kendilerine mukayyet olacaklar yani, değil mi?" {n}Haimonkulus, yoldaşlarına alaycı alaycı gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, I doubt that. While you were floundering between life and death, your servants became very agitated. Several ridiculous threats were uttered before your lackeys realised that the life of their {mf|master|mistress} was completely in my hands. So they are going to behave themselves, aren't they?" {n}The Haemonculus smiles mockingly at your companions.{/n}
